name: Malmaison Glasgow
overview:
Housed in a former Episcopalian church, the Glasgow Malmaison is one of the most stylish hotels in Glasgow. Don’t be fooled by the location though, the Glasgow Malmaison is dedicated to luxury and pleasure, with sumptuous rooms, fine wine and dining. Rooms and suites at the Malmaison Glasgow offer comfort and splendour to guests, with super comfortable beds, flat screen TVs and en-suites with roll top baths and power showers. Enjoy some classics with a contemporary twist in the Brasserie, which is located in the crypt of the church or share a cocktail or two in the Malbar. Malmaison Glasgow is also an ideal location for weddings and civil ceremonies and you’ll get your own event planner to help you with every detail, ensuring you have a day to remember.

Business travellers will benefit from excellent facilities and technology for meetings and conferences for up to 80 guests. With our range of dedicated meeting rooms, Malmaison Glasgow will have something to suit your needs.
